titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Secretary to the Government of India, Foreign Department

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the need to employ a confidential clerk as Pelly has been using a young man he trained in the Persian Gulf, but that he will be required to return there now Pelly's appointment has been confirmed.The letter goes on to comment on the essential use the young man has been as the confidential clerk and suggesting a way of re-arranging the assistants to cover the costs of a clerk if one cannot be granted.
